summary.para: Receives DLL-specific version information. It is used with the DllGetVersion function.

remarks.para: Your application must set the cbSize member of the structure pointed to by info1 to sizeof(DLLVERSIONINFO2) before calling DllGetVersion. Otherwise, no value will be assigned to the dwFlags or ullVersion member of the DLLVERSIONINFO2 structure.

summary.para: A structure. This member is included to provide backward compatibility with applications that are not expecting a DLLVERSIONINFO2 structure.

A value that contains the version information. It is divided into four 16-bitfields containing the major and minor version numbers, the build number, and the hotfix version, in that order. Use the macro to construct this value.
